title: A is for Achoo: An Alphabet Adventure
description: Perfect Polly and Mimi the cat create their own surprise birthday celebration for Nana after Mom lies down for a quick nap before the party. Each letter of the alphabet, its sound, and an action word is used as they make one disaster after another. This is a great book for learning the upper- and lowercase alphabet letters, sounds, signs, and related action word.
author: L.L. Hansen
